sense.gloss: Lagenaria siceraria var. gourda (variety of bottle gourd), gourd (container) made from its fruit
Lagenaria siceraria var. depressa (variety of bottle gourd)
receiving with food and drink (e.g. troops), baskets of rice and vessels of congee
